Mission and Vision

Our Mission is to be a reliable source of Fresh, Organic and Healthy friuts for both loval and export markets

About Us

Why Choose Us

UrbanGreen Farms Ghana aims at being an integrated sustainable leader in the sector of agriculture both locally and internationally.

UrbanGreen Farms Ghana is all about Healthy Living through our eating. That is why is our priority to serve you with pure organic fruits and vegetables


•We supply the local and export markets with a wide variety of agriculture produce. We are working with local farmer groups by providing them with farm inputs, logistics, and marketing support and act as a purchasing hub to minimize post-harvest losses.

•Through our established partnerships and suppliers, we are committed to create and expand business alliances ,in particular in the processing and expanding the Agricultural sector.

•We are working on adapting the latest in agricultural technology , to help improve productivity and yield.

•We have an amazing support team in place to provide our client base with innovative solutions for their business.

•Our fresh and quality farm produce are packaged and distributed to major supermarket chains, hotels, restaurants, and speciality catering establishments in Ghana. We also serve the direct consumer market that is increasingly becoming conscious of healthy eating habits and the need to purchase quality farm produce from a trusted source.
